Package gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.UI

Interface Summary
ActionValueListener This interface allows listeners to be notified of an ActionEvent and have access to the old and new values without calling a get/set method on the source of the event.
 

Class Summary
ActionValueEvent This class extends the capabilities of the ActionEvent by providing an old and new value, similar to the PropertyChangeEvent.
ActionValueJFrame  
ActionValueJPanel  
ActionValueSupport  
ActiveJPanel This class is a base class for panels that group one or more components into a new reusable control that maintains a list of ActionListeners and sends actionEvents to the listeners when something is changed.
AnimationController An AnimationController object is a GUI component for controlling a sequence of displayed images.
ColorScaleImage Objects of this class are a simple "ramp" color scale giving the correlation between an index and a color for the current pseudo-color scale.
ColorScaleMenu This class represents a JMenu listing available "named" pseudo color scales.
FontUtil Provide common set of fonts to use for borders, labels, special symbols, etc.
SplitPaneWithState This class extends the JSplitPane class with "state" information, so that if the user set a divider position that is some fraction of the way across the split pane, that fractional position will be preserved when the entire split pane is resized.
TextRangeUI A TextRangeUI object is an editable JTextField object with a format that includes two numerical values, in square brackets, separated by a colon.
TextValueUI A TextValueI object is an editable JTextField object with a format that has one numerical value, in square brackets.
